snippet: Gregory Scarpa Jr., a captain in the Colombo crime family serving a decades-long prison term, was granted a 10-year sentence reduction for information on Terry Nichols, a co-conspirator of the Oklahoma City bombing.
abstract: Federal Judge Edward R Korman reduces prison sentence of Colombo crime family captain Gregory Scarpa Jr for informing on fellow inmate Terry L Nichols, co-conspirator in Oklahoma City bombing; information provided by Scarpa led to discovery of explosives cache in Nichols's former home.
lead_paragraph: Gregory Scarpa Jr., a captain in the Colombo crime family serving a decades-long prison term, was granted a 10-year sentence reduction for information on Terry Nichols, a co-conspirator of the Oklahoma City bombing.

headline.main: A Mafia Captain Turned Informer Gets a Reduced Prison Term
headline.print_headline: A Mafia Captain Turned Informer Has 10 Years Cut From His Prison Term
